name: Reddit Inverted (and therefore Dark)
description: Inspired by style 15215, this style inverts the color values and images on reddit.com, making the site easier on the eyes. This also incorporates comment guidelines from style 8804.
additional_info:
I recommend that you uncheck the "allow reddits to show me custom styles" option on the preferences page.

Enjoy and report any bugs you find, or anything you think needs changing.
